title: I-Ching â€” Bitcoin Time-Value Loss Calculator
blurb: Quantify the opportunity cost of spending or selling BTC earlier vs. holding to a later price.
description: I-Ching computes BTC time-value deltas between two dates. Enter the BTC (or fiat) spent at the earlier time and the BTC/USD prices for start and end. The tool reports opportunity cost in USD, BTC foregone, days between, and an effective APR over the period. Runs fully locally in your browser.
